page.title: 18EAST FARNDON CHURCH
page.content: St.John the Baptist Church is situated at the top of the village.The first rector was there in 1233.The present rector has{three other {parishes}which are Great Oxendon, Arthingworth and Harrington.The kneelers have been made to remember either special royal occasions or local village scenes. There are{three organs,}one with a foot pump,the second has an electric pump and the third is a modern electric one.There are five bells.One of them is out of order so an appeal is being launched to raise money to repair it.Bellringing is every Thursday.There are two{church wardens at the moment.One is Mr.J.Hyde who lives at The Old School House,East Farndon,the second is Mr.N.West who lives at Farrar Farm,East Farndon.
